description.desc1: Provides controls for mapping textures to an output window by repositioning the image corners.
description.desc2: It is the most simple and easy to use mapping nodes at SPARCK's disposal

edit.descript: sets the focus of the editor window to this node

reset.descript: resets the corner pins to their default positions

RenderGroup.descript: set the render group. Capture/Beamer/3DViewer have an equivalent in which you can choose which group to render.

render to.descript: Select the ViewPort node to directly render to.

drawcorners.descript: draws to handles in the final rendering

layer.descript: depth layer (works best with depth-buffering off)

Feedback.feedback1: Documentations take a lot of time and effort. Unfortunately both are scarce ressources.
Feedback.feedback2: If you would like to have more info about this node please drop a note. It helps to set priorities according to the user needs...
